attributes.action: Allow Students in the UK to wear their own clothes to school
attributes.additional_details: Because students need to have some freedom
attributes.background: Let the students wear their own uniform to school, people have mental issues what affect them wearing school clothes due to suffocation, and they don’t get a look in the real world you do not go out everyday in a suit or something formal

rejection.details:
This is a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. It is already the case that schools can set their own uniform policies, which could include allowing students to wear their own clothes to school.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550875
